title: 1.143 STATE TREE.
text:
The Red pine (Pinus resinosa), more commonly known as Norway pine, is designated as the official state tree of the state of Minnesota.
A photograph of the Red pine, to be obtained and approved by the commissioner of natural resources, shall be certified and preserved in the Office of the Secretary of State.

variables.name: state_tree
variables.description: The designated state tree of a state.

variables.name: tree_photo_approved
variables.description: Indicates if the photograph of the state tree has been approved by the commissioner of natural resources.

consequences: The Red pine is officially recognized as the state tree of Minnesota.
A certified photograph of the Red pine is preserved in the Office of the Secretary of State.
